fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Climate Action
head_office_address: c/o Institut für Erd- und Umweltwissenschaften der Universität Potsdam Karl-Liebknecht-Str. 24-25
eu_initiatives:
Research directives in Earth Sciences 
Supporting the Geosciences in universities, schools and the general public
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: GeoUnion was established to support scientific collaboration between the geosciences and with neighbouring disciplines and to disseminate the importance, research questions and achievements of the geoscientific disciplines into the general public. GeoUnion organizes conferences, lecture series, seminars and publications to bring geosciences to a wider audience,
relevant_communication: MOBI - Meere und Ozeane im Binnenland - Taken Seas and Oceans to non-maritime hinterlands: a series of seminars for nature and wildlife initiatives, schools and institutions of further education
